text: Ubaldo Jiménez (born January 22, 1984) is a pitcher for the Baltimore Orioles. He became the first pitcher for the Colorado Rockies to throw a no-hitter on April 17, 2010. He is from the Dominican Republic. In 2010, Jiménez was the starting National League pitcher at the MLB All-Star Game, which the National League won. Category:Colorado Rockies players Category:1984 births Category:Living people Category:Baltimore Orioles players
title: Ubaldo Jiménez
